game.name: Item Collector Ball
game.shortDescription: You're a ball that collects items! Vibe to original tunes in this physics based time trial 3d platformer while you push a ball through a series of dynamic obstacles that affect your movement and destroy you in novel ways.
game.shortDescriptionEn: You're a ball that collects items! Vibe to original tunes in this physics based time trial 3d platformer while you push a ball through a series of dynamic obstacles that affect your movement and destroy you in novel ways.
